creator: dellasavia@gmail.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: You are likely missing the "poi-scratchpad-XXX.jar" library of POI in your classpath which holds some of the classes that are necessary for working with Word Documents.

creator: dellasavia@gmail.com
text:
I'm have using maven to get the necessary libraries... in my pom.xml I have the following:

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
            <artifactId>poi</artifactId>
            <version>3.11</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
            <artifactId>poi-ooxml</artifactId>
            <version>3.11</version>
        </dependency>

What is wrong?

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: FYI, the requirement on scratch-jar is not intended, but unfortunately made it into 3.12, newer releases will have this dependency removed again, see bug 57963 for this.

creator: dellasavia@gmail.com
text: Tks, Dominik. It works beautifully for me!
